abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Compute a quantitative value by applying a defined computational procedure or functional transformation to one or more input data elements.

Perform a combined step that includes: determining relative quantitative relationships between inputs; integrating multiple quantitative inputs to produce unified measures; applying defined transformations to inputs to produce outputs; and evaluating collections of elements against criteria to select qualifying elements. This synthesis ensures all workflows' unique intermediate operations are covered in a single cohesive step.
Derive a new quantitative value by applying a specified functional relationship or transformation to one or more input measures or previously computed values.
